title: Kylie in the City 2
description: Choosing to follow her dreams and moving to the Big Apple had been a big risk for single Mormon girl, Kylie McKay. Now that she's an actual resident of the City that Never Sleeps, she's found that being Mormon and single so far away from Utah and everything she knows is much more of a challenge than she had anticipated.Kylie loves living in the City and pursuing her dreams. Work is great, but her dating life needs a reboot after a disastrous dating experiment gone wrong. With the unexpected appearance of a new relationship, Kylie and her roommates set their sights on a new plan to help reform their views on dating and men. From building solid friendships to dealing with heartbreak, Kylie finds out what it really means to be a single LDS girl in a city with infinite possibilities.Kylie in the City: Episode 2 is 10,500 words or approximately 30-40 pages.
author: Laura Keysor
